title: Senior Project - Advanced Internship Experience in Agribusiness
description: A minimum of 120 hours spent with an approved agribusiness firm. Independent internship experience conducted under faculty supervision focusing on a discipline area of agribusiness. Completion of a project as a component of the internship. Formal report and presentation required.
prerequisites: Senior standing and Agribusiness major; AGB 301; AGB 310; AGB 312; AGB 313; AGB 323; and AGB 327 or AGB 328
